text:
A, A is for Alligator
B, B is for Bear

C, C is for camel
D, D is for Dolphin

E, E is for elephant
F, F is for flamingo

G, G is for gorilla
H, H is for Hippo

I, I is for Iguana
J, J is for Jellyfish

K, K is for Kangaroo
L, L

is for lion
M, M is for monkey

N, N is for Newt
O, O is for Owl

P, P is for penguin
Q, Q is for Quail

R, R is for Rhino
S, S is for Snake

T, T is for Tiger
U, U is for Urchin

V, V is for Vulture
W, W is for Whale

X, X is for X-Ray Fish
Y, Y is for Yak

Thanks for learning animal ABC with us, see
you again next time!
